backend/main.mo: Defines Motoko canister with access control, blob storage mixins, user profiles, binders, photocards, and CRUD-style binder/card operations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated source files, components, tests, and confidence for build verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short human-written summaries for all major frontend files related to auth, binders, cards, and UI theming.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark theming and scrapbook-style colors.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication flow, profile setup, navigation, and screen rendering.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App-wide layout with header, user info, logout handling, and footer.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginPanel.ts: Internet Identity login screen with branding and sign‑in button.
frontend/src/features/auth/ProfileSetupM: Modal component that collects a user's display name and saves it via a profile mutation.
frontend/src/features/binders/theme.ts: Provides a function returning the default binder theme configuration.
frontend/src/features/cards/editedImageC: LocalStorage helpers for saving, retrieving, and clearing edited card images.
frontend/src/features/cards/imageValidat: Validates uploaded image files for type and size limits.
frontend/src/features/editor/stickerTray: Defines sticker types and loads sticker images from a sprite sheet for the editor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook managing Internet Identity login, state, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for profiles, binders, cards, and related mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom scrapbook-themed color variables and utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/screens/AddCardScreen.tsx: UI for adding a photocard, handling file validation, preview, and upload via useAddPhotocard with progress updates.
frontend/src/screens/BinderLibraryScreen: Displays the list of binders and provides creation and deletion dialogs using related query hooks.
frontend/src/screens/BinderSettingsScree: Allows customizing a binder’s theme and saving changes using useUpdateBinderTheme.
frontend/src/screens/BinderViewScreen.ts: Shows a binder’s cards with drag‑and‑drop reordering and navigation to add, edit, or customize the binder.
frontend/src/screens/EditCardScreen.tsx: Provides a canvas-based editor for adding, moving, and saving stickers on a photocard image.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, features, and required assets for a photocard binder app including uploads, editing, theming, and UI screens.
